replies.author: a1294790523
replies.txt_content:
MC报错分析指南——从入门到放弃
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-872259-1-1.html
常见报错
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: unable to create new native thread

解决方法：在JVM参数中加入-Xss1M

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content:
内存不足，尝试分配更多的内存
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: unable to create new native thread7
